meta_description: The Musée de la civilisation takes a fresh look at the human experience with its uniquely enchanting, knowledgeable and thoughtful approach.

accessibility_text:
Génération M

### Une relève philanthropique 

Composé de jeunes professionnels et professionnelles qui s’impliquent auprès de la Fondation du Musée, le comité Génération M fait rayonner l’institution, en plus d’organiser diverses activités de financement afin de soutenir l’une des grandes missions du Musée : rendre la culture accessible à toutes et à tous.

[En savoir plus](http://web.archive.org/web/20251008214725/https://mcq.org/soutenir/fondation/generation-m/)

collections_text:
This content is intended for the public covered by the exceptions of the _Charter of the French language_ and its regulations. If you read on, you confirm that you fall within one of [these exceptions](https://www.quebec.ca/en/gouvernement/politiques-orientations/langue-francaise/modernization-charter-french-language#c214034).

#  Musée de la civilisation Let's experience the world... together. 

[]() The Titanic. Human Story exhibition is sold out today. Regular tickets are still available. 

Tickets for the _Titanic. The Human Story_ exhibition are limited. **Buy your tickets online and save up to $3 per ticket!**

[Buy tickets](https://boutique.mcq.org/en_US/tickets)
